question:
You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.


Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letter
introduce yourselfdescribe your plans for the partyinvite your neighbour to come
text: I am writing this letter to you to introduce myself.

My name is Jay Dave, and I am a university student at the University of Georgia. I moved to apartment B10 yesterday. Next Friday, is going to be my birthday, so I and my friends were planning to celebrate it in my new apartment at 10 P.M,  but we are worried that the noise may disturb you and your family members. We will play music and sing some songs. We do not want to disturb your peace. That's why I decided to share my thoughts with you.

If you haven't any problem with our party, I would kindly ask you and all your family to join us. You are all more than welcome to come if you have time, but please, let me know at least one day ahead of the party so that I can arrange for the numbers. I can't wait to hear from you.
